title: Abstract: Introduction to the Mobilize IDS Curriculum v4.0
body: This document outlines the Mobilize IDS Curriculum version 4.0, specifically tailored for LAUSD. It provides a link for downloading or previewing the curriculum materials, accessible via a Box.com link. The curriculum is designed to equip users with knowledge and skills related to IDS (Intrusion Detection Systems) within an educational context.

title: Curriculum Availability and Access
body: The Mobilize IDS Curriculum version 4.0 is exclusively available for LAUSD. Access to the full curriculum, including download and preview options, is provided through a direct link to a UCLA Box.com repository. The URL for this resource is https://ucla.app.box.com/v/mobilize-ids-curriculum.

title: Mobilize IDS Curriculum v4.0 for LAUSD
body: This curriculum, identified as version 4.0, is the Mobilize IDS Curriculum. It is specifically designated for use within the Los Angeles Unified School District (LAUSD). Resources can be obtained by downloading or previewing them from a provided link.

title: Accessing the Mobilize IDS Curriculum Materials
body: To access the Mobilize IDS Curriculum, version 4.0, users within LAUSD can utilize the provided link. This link directs to a secure platform (Box.com) where the curriculum can be downloaded or previewed. The content focuses on Intrusion Detection Systems (IDS).
